text: "Day & Night" is a single by Billie Piper, released in 2000. The song was Piper's 3rd UK #1 single. ==Track listings== UK Single CD1 Cat. #: SINCD11 # Day & Night (Stargate Mix) # Day & Night (Almighty Club Mix) # Day & Night (Robbie Rivera's Bombastic) # Day & Night Video + Picture Gallery Category:2000 songs Category:Billie Piper songs Category:Pop songs
title: Day & Night (song)
